channel.title: CVE Feed for Silicon Labs -- UZB-7
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Silicon Labs -- UZB-7

item.title: CVE-2020-10137|2024-09-16T18:13:44.506Z -- silicon%20labs -- uzb-7
item.description: Z-Wave devices based on Silicon Labs 700 series chipsets using S2 do not adequately authenticate or encrypt FIND_NODE_IN_RANGE frames, allowing a remote, unauthenticated attacker to inject a FIND_NODE_IN_RANGE frame with an invalid random payload, denying service by blocking the processing of upcoming events.
